import React,{useEffect,useState} from 'react' import FileBase from 'react-file-base64'; import { Form, Button, Row, Container } from 'react-bootstrap'; import {createProduct} from '../api/api' const AddProductScreen = () => { const [productData, setProductData] = useState({category:'',name:'', description:'', brand:'', price:0 ,countInStock:0, image:'' }) const submitHandler = async(e) =>{ e.preventDefault() console.log(productData) createProduct(productData) } return(
Product Name setProductData({ ...productData, name: e.target.value })} placeholder="Product Name" /> Brand Name setProductData({ ...productData, brand: e.target.value })} placeholder="Brand Name" /> Description setProductData({ ...productData, description: e.target.value })} placeholder="Description" />
setProductData({ ...productData, image: base64 })} />
{/* setProductData({ ...productData, image: e.target.value })} label="Product image" /> */} Price setProductData({ ...productData, price: e.target.value })} placeholder="Price" />
) } export default AddProductScreen;
